# Vulpkanin
The Vulpkanin (vulp-ka-nin) are a race of humanoid canine-like beings.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Uses their claws to do some Slashing and Blunt damage. - Their fur makes them able to withstand cold environments without the need of a coat.
## Special
- Comes with the Deuteranopia trait by default. This can be disabled via accessibility options.
## Drawbacks
- They take 15% more Heat damage.
